events.content: Fixed cloud link page auth check: Fixed cloud link page auth check

raw.question: Fixed cloud link page auth check
raw.chosen: Fixed cloud link page auth check
raw.reasoning: checkAuth() was looking for data.userId but /api/auth/session returns { authenticated: true, user: { id } }. Changed to check data.authenticated && data.user?.id

events.content: Added return URL support to login page: Added return URL support to login page

raw.question: Added return URL support to login page
raw.chosen: Added return URL support to login page
raw.reasoning: Login page ignored ?return= query param, always redirecting to /app after auth. Added useSearchParams to read return URL and redirect back (e.g., to cloud link page)

events.content: Wrapped login page in Suspense boundary: Wrapped login page in Suspense boundary

raw.question: Wrapped login page in Suspense boundary
raw.chosen: Wrapped login page in Suspense boundary
raw.reasoning: useSearchParams requires Suspense for Next.js static generation. Created LoginContent component wrapped in Suspense with LoginLoading fallback

retrospective.summary: Fixed two bugs in cloud link flow: 1) Auth check used wrong response shape 2) Login page ignored return URL param. Also added Suspense boundary for Next.js static gen.
